oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This account is again followed by the Anteaters laws concerning the habits of various animals, such as the jackal, the 'Loffelhund' (Proteles), etc., who were, once upon a time, men. (L II.-2. 323-356.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The story of the Silver Jackal (the Anteater's laws)
